name: KeyBoardCollaging
description:
Made using #P5js for ProcJam 

Buttons that are pressable

l,j,k,i - shape manipulation

s - for saving

d,a,w,q - for poetic, consumption

r - reset background

any color maybe a background

r followed by w,q,i,j,k,l will maintain background color

b, v - for audio consumption

press a second time to stop the audio

one of the audio was coded using #tidalcycles and the other #sonicpi

mousePressed for poetic consumption

depending on when you press it background changes

O - to make text Size Bigger

for the next poetic lines

P - to make tezt Size Smaller

for the next poetic lines

g,h,t,y, u - random assortment of photos filters
